main event: Multiple witnesses reported seeing a metallic disc-shaped object hovering in San Antonio, Texas on 27 May 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as approximately the size of a dinner plate held at arm's length., Witnesses noted a peculiar whirring sound emanating from the object., It exhibited no signs of wings, propellers, or typical aircraft features., The object remained motionless for a period of time before disappearing from view., The sighting lasted for about 20 minutes.
witness description: two neighbors observing the object together
